title: ERROR: Failed building wheel for gmpy (installation ludwig)

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
Installation ludwig to venv

```
  ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1:
   command: /home/nimiq/Dev/Python/Ludwig/env/bin/python3 -u -c 'import sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-install-7wnoaj0k/gmpy/setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'/tmp/pip-install-7wnoaj0k/gmpy/setup.py'"'"';f=getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' bdist_wheel -d /tmp/pip-wheel-v_ojnkwm --python-tag cp37
       cwd: /tmp/pip-install-7wnoaj0k/gmpy/
  Complete output (14 lines):
  running bdist_wheel
  running build
  running build_ext
  building 'gmpy' extension
  creating build
  creating build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7
  creating build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/src
  x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc -pthread -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -g -fstack-protector-strong -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -fPIC -I./src -I/usr/include/python3.7m -I/home/nimiq/Dev/Python/Ludwig/env/include/python3.7m -c src/gmpy.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/src/gmpy.o
  In file included from src/gmpy.c:251:
  src/gmpy.h:30:10: fatal error: gmp.h: No such file or directory
   #include "gmp.h"
            ^~~~~~~
  compilation terminated.
  error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1
  ----------------------------------------
  ERROR: Failed building wheel for gmpy
```

**Environment**
